  ✖ A switch case should only have a single statement. If you want more, then wrap it in a block.

    1 │ switch (foo) {
    2 │  case true:
  > 3 │  case false:
  > 4 │   let foo = '';
  > 5 │   foo;
      │ ^^^^^^
    6 │ }
